title: [Morgahan's Armory]
[Morgahan's Weaponry]
description: The broad sweep of the wooden floor is interrupted by a worn rug.  Halfway to the wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A narrow glass-topped table and an iron-banded wooden chest are pushed close together in the back of the shop.

The broad sweep of the oak floor is interrupted by a polar bear rug.  Halfway to the oak beam ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the pale oak walls.  A narrow glass-topped table and an iron-banded wooden chest are pushed close together in the back of the shop.
